org.hps.conditions.database

Class ConnectionParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.conditions.database.ConnectionParameters

  • public final class ConnectionParameters
extends Object
    This class encapsulates the parameters for connecting to a database, including host name, port, user and password.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONNECTION_PROPERTY_FILE
      Name of system property that can be used to specify custom database connection parameters.
      static String CONNECTION_PROPERTY_RESOURCE
      Connection property resource.
      private String database
      The database name.
      static int DEFAULT_PORT
      The default port number.
      private String hostname
      The host name.
      private static int MAX_ATTEMPTS
      Number of connection retries allowed.
      private String password
      The user's password.
      private int port
      The port.
      private static int RETRY_WAIT
      Wait time (in millis) for the first retry.
      private String user
      The user name.

        Number of connection retries allowed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RETRY_WAIT

        private static final int RETRY_WAIT
        Wait time (in millis) for the first retry. The nth retry waits for n*RETRY_WAIT millis.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Returns:
        the connection parameters
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the InputStream is invalid

      • fromResource

        public static ConnectionParameters fromResource(String resource)
        Configure the connection parameters from an embedded classpath resource which should be a properties file.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource path
        Returns:
        the connection parameters

      • createConnection

        public Connection createConnection()
        Create a database connection from these parameters. The caller becomes the "owner" and is responsible for closing it when finished.
        Returns:
        the new Connection object

      • getConnectionProperties

        public Properties getConnectionProperties()
        Get Properties object for this connection.
        Returns:
        the Properties for this connection

      • getConnectionString

        public String getConnectionString()
        Get the connection string for these parameters.

        This is public because the DQM database manager is using it.

        Returns:
        the connection string
